page.title: 07EDUCATION IN CODICOTE/WELWYN
page.content: Provision of State Education is divided between the North and Mid- Herts divisions of the Hertfordshire County Council Education Authority. The one school within the area of the survey, Codicote JMI, is in the North- Herts division based at Hitchin. It includes a Nursery class. For Secondary Education children have to be "bussed" to near-by Welwyn Garden City, Hitchin for single-sex schooling or Stevenage Roman Catholic Schools. County policy is to provide mixed mini-Comprehensive schools of about 1000 pupils aged 11+ to 18+ plus a limited number of specialist schools, and Colleges of Further Education for students aged 16+ to 18+. The nearest private schools are in Welwyn Garden City, Hitchin, or St. Albans.
